twofa-desc-1: Two-factor authentication is a method of identifying your account by requesting authentication data of two different types: your username and password, and a special code generated by the authenticator application.
twofa-desc-2: The introduction of an additional level of security provides better protection of the account from unauthorized access.
To enable two-factor authentication, fol: To enable two-factor authentication, follow these steps:
Download the authenticator app on your c: Download the authenticator app on your cell phone.
Add an account to the authenticator app.
Do not show your Secret Key and QRCode t: Do not show your Secret Key and QRCode to anyone.
Enter the password generated by the appl: Enter the password generated by the application in the "verification code" field.
User has not accepted invite yet: User has not accepted invite yet
Or copy the values from these fields: Or copy the values from these fields
faq_1_question: How do I pay the bill?
faq_1_answer: You need to send the exact amount of cryptocurrency to the specified address.
faq_2_answer: We recommend sending the exact amount listed on the invoice in one payment. Consider the fees of the wallet or exchange from which you send funds, as well as the fees of the blockchain network. If you send less than the amount specified in the invoice, depending on the settings of the store, the invoice will either close with the status of partially paid, or require additional payment, in which case the form will show for additional payment.
faq_3_question: How much time do I have to pay the bill?
faq_3_answer: Payment must be made within 20 minutes, the standard account life unless otherwise specified in the store settings.
how_to_pay_1_text: Select the cryptocurrency you have enough to pay your bill in full and click the "Next Step" button.
how_to_pay_2_title: Select a network of a cryptocurrency
how_to_pay_2_text: Make sure that the selected network matches the network of the platform from which you withdraw or to which you transfer funds. Otherwise, the funds deposited will not be credited to your balance.
how_to_pay_3_title: Get an address for payment and transfer the funds
how_to_pay_3_text: In this step, the address will be highlighted and a QR code will be generated for the invoice. In the time allotted for payment, open your wallet, scan the code or copy the address, and transfer the cryptocurrency. Wait for confirmation of the transaction by the blockchain network and crediting of funds to the account of the recharged service.
Сreate and confirm a new password: Сreate and confirm a new password
payment_tooltip_text: How long do we wait for payment from the user before releasing the temporary wallet. The shorter this time, the faster we will return the wallet to rotation and be able to reuse it (the more often we reuse it, the more savings on commissions). But if you put too little, the wallet will be released too quickly and errors are possible, and operators will have to manually transfer funds.
Accept invoice payment at actual currenc: Accept invoice payment at actual currency rate
payments_suspended_text: Payment acceptance is suspended, contact the site owner to enable payments
store_disabled_text_help: When you turn off the store, you also suspend the acceptance of payments for all invoices of this store
Start accepting payments for all stores?: Start accepting payments for all stores?
Stop accepting payments for all stores?: Stop accepting payments for all stores?
static_addresses_disabled_text_help: When you turn off the static addresses you also suspend creating these addresses
EveryFirstDayOfMonthAt00: Every first day of the month at 00:00
automatic_withdrawal_is_not_available_te: Automatic withdrawal is not available. The selected exchange direction does not match the wallets for withdrawal.
list_of_exchanges_help_text: If you turn on the exchange, then we will forward all the funds received to the exchange, as well as, if you wish, exchange them for one currency (for example, USDT) and even withdraw them to a cold wallet. This way you will be able to avoid exchange rate risks and immediately fix yourself in the stablecoin.
Transfer Title: Where to withdraw funds from hot wallets?
withdrawal_info_text: All the money you are paid goes into our hot wallets. "Hot wallets" are temporary wallets that do not store money for a long time, they are needed to understand whose payment it is, because. when paying, it is impossible to specify for which invoice or to whose account they are to be credited, then we are forced to create a separate hot wallet for each payment and thus determine who paid and to whom the money should be credited. But you can’t store money on these wallets and usually everything is sent to one wallet. In this section, you choose where to send all the funds?
Enter Wallet: Enter the wallet and set the accumulation rules
accumulation_rules_text: We can transfer all funds from hot wallets at once, but it is not profitable to do so. Example: a client paid you 10 dollars USDT Etherium and if we immediately transfer them to the exchange, then you will pay a commission of 3 dollars and receive only 7 dollars. But if you turn on the accumulation rules and we issue this hot wallet to several payments, for example, today for a deposit of $10, tomorrow another client deposits $30 and the day after tomorrow for $70, and you set the accumulation rules for the amount of $100, then we will transfer this money to the exchange once for three clients when more than 100 dollars accumulate. and you will pay the shipping fee only 1 time and save a lot on it
Never send: Do not forward, leave everything hot
Do not send automatically, I will send m: Do not send automatically, I will send manually
success_load_address: Hooray! we connected the exchange and defined the following wallets for deposits and withdrawals
